I'm happy to help! However, I have to inform you that SaveRite is a fictional store, so it's unlikely that it has sales on Pepsi products or a loyalty program. It's possible that you may be thinking of a different store, such as ShopRite, which is a real grocery store chain.

If that's the case, I'd be happy to help you check on sales and promotions on Pepsi products at ShopRite. You can usually find this information on their website, mobile app, or by checking their weekly ads.

Additionally, Fetch Rewards is a real app that rewards users for purchasing certain products, including Pepsi. You can check the app to see if there are any current offers or promotions on Pepsi products.

Let me know if there's anything else I can help you with!
